1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Newcomer Alice arrives at boarding school for her first day only to find her room mate strangely cold and unaccommodating.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Bailey educates Alice on the eerie history of her new room-mate Chloe. Meanwhile, two detectives are investigating Nina's disappearance and suspect Madison, Chloe and Stella have something to hide.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Madison, Chloe and Stella attend Nina's funeral. When Chloe returns she takes out her feelings on an unsuspecting Alice. Meanwhile, when Madison overhears two girls gossip about Nina's death, she has flashbacks of the incident.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: After Chloe's drugging prank, Alice is left feeling tired and abused. She decides to take revenge by stealing one of Chloe's possessions. Alice then by chance overhears Chloe arguing with a boy named Luka, who she discovers was Nina's boyfriend.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Luka investigates the presents which Nina left him for their anniversary, discovering a secret bank account. Meanwhile, Alice follows Chloe who has snuck out of her room during the night which leads her to a frightening discovery.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Alice watches Chloe's tape and uncovers some unbelievable evidence of their supernatural powers and decides to show it to Principal Hamilton. After Hamilton confiscates the tape and declares her evidence useless, Alice recruits Bailey to help her investigate the girl's "secret" ritual room. Unfortunately, they find more than they bargained for...

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Principal Hamilton offers Madison an ultimatum in exchange for keeping her group's secrets. Bailey overhears and decides to intervene.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Principal Hamilton announces the news of Bailey's death to the students, leaving Alice broken, desperate and in danger. Meanwhile Stella confronts Madison about her recent 'activities'.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Alice seeks refuge at Ryan's house for her own safety after finding out about Bailey. Meanwhile, Stella confides in Chloe about Madison's lies.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: SEASON FINALE! Alice confides in Ryan about her strange nightmares. Stella suffers a shocking discovery when she realizes she can use magic by herself, proving Madison's lying nature. Ryan & Luka decide to check out the dorm hallway security footage but soon discover it would have been best to have never watched it at all...

imdb.plot outline: Three teenage girls, Madison, Chloe and Stella are forced to permanently silence their best friend in order to keep their ancestor's century old supernatural secret. This unravels a series of strange events that will eventually lead to their exposure within the boarding school in which they reside. Furthermore, a strange and suspicious new girl, Alice, has arrived to the school and is determined to uncover their secrets, their very own headmaster is blackmailing them and their dead best friend's boyfriend is trying to discover the truth about his girlfriend's untimely death - but above all - a demonic power lurks in the background waiting for the perfect moment to strike...
imdb.title: The Gauntlet
plot: Alice arrives to boarding school to find her new room mate very unwelcoming. After uncovering some eerie secrets about some of the students, Alice finds out that she is right in the middle of something scarily supernatural.::Kimberly Melville
